::GoldenEye::

She flew over the mountain and saw the pod fall tothe ground like a 
falling star.  She floew down and perched in a tree near the pod and 
looked at what would emerge. 

She saw nothing come out of pod.  CUriousity getting the better of 
her, she flew down for a closer look.  She landed near the pod and 
transformed into bot mode.  She walked up to the pod and looked at 
it.  It seamed undamaged and she hoped the bot inside was alright.  
She knocked on the pod, "Any one home?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Dollen::
> 
>             A stasis pod comes zooming down towards Earth.  It 
eventually lands in P.E.I in Canada.  Nothing is damaged, the pod is 
in fine condition.
> 
>    (Can someone please find Dollen, the Predacon?)
